foreignData.name: Schreckensschleier-Bewahrer
foreignData.text:
Du kannst bestimmen, den Schreckensschleier-Bewahrer während deines Enttapp-Segments nicht zu enttappen.
{2}{B}, {T}: Solange der Schreckensschleier-Bewahrer getappt bleibt, erhält ein Zombie deiner Wahl +2/+2 und hat Furcht. (Sie kann nur von schwarzen und/oder Artefaktkreaturen geblockt werden.)

foreignData.name: Mensajero velotemible
foreignData.text:
Puedes elegir no enderezar el Mensajero velotemible durante tu paso de enderezar.
{2}{B}, {T}: Mientras el Mensajero velotemible permanezca girado, el Zombie objetivo obtiene +2/+2 y tiene la habilidad de inspirar temor. (No puede ser bloqueado excepto por criaturas artefacto y/o criaturas negras.)

foreignData.name: Messager craintesuaire
foreignData.text:
Vous pouvez choisir de ne pas dégager le Messager craintesuaire pendant votre étape de dégagement.
{2}{B}, {T} : Tant que le Messager craintesuaire est engagé, le zombie ciblé gagne +2/+2 et acquiert la peur. (Elle ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par des créatures-artefacts et/ou des créatures noires.)

foreignData.name: Messaggero Mantorrore
foreignData.text:
Puoi scegliere di non STAPpare il Messaggero Mantorrore durante il tuo STAP.
{2}{B}, {T}: Fintanto che il Messaggero Mantorrore rimane TAPpato, lo Zombie bersaglio prende +2/+2 e ha paura (non può essere bloccato tranne che da creature artefatto e/o da creature nere).

foreignData.name: Mensageiro do Manto Assustador
foreignData.text:
Você pode optar por não desvirar Mensageiro do Manto Assustador durante sua etapa de desvirar.
{2}{B}, {T}: Enquanto Mensageiro do Manto Assustador permanecer virado, o Zumbi alvo recebe +2/+2 e tem a habilidade de amedrontar. (Ela só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas pretas e/ou criaturas artefato.)

name: Frightshroud Courier
originalText:
You may choose not to untap Frightshroud Courier during your untap step.
o2o
B, oc
T: As long as Frightshroud Courier remains tapped, target Zombie gets +2/+2 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

rulings.text: It checks the creature type when the ability is announced and resolved, but once the effect is placed on the creature, if its creature type changes the effect still continues.

text:
You may choose not to untap Frightshroud Courier during your untap step.
{2}{B}, {T}: Target Zombie creature gets +2/+2 and has fear for as long as Frightshroud Courier remains tapped. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
